mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.shenherizhi_table as shenherizhiTable ,a.shenherizhi_name as shenherizhiName ,a.shenherizhi_phone as shenherizhiPhone ,a.shenherizhi_id_number as shenherizhiIdNumber ,a.shenherizhi_jieguo as shenherizhiJieguo ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM shenherizhi a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.shenherizhi_table like CONCAT('%',#{params.shenherizhiTable},'%')
and a.shenherizhi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.shenherizhiName},'%')
and a.shenherizhi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.shenherizhiPhone},'%')
and a.shenherizhi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.shenherizhiIdNumber},'%')
and a.shenherizhi_jieguo like CONCAT('%',#{params.shenherizhiJieguo},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
